Table 20.  Number of sentenced inmate in Federal prisons, by most serious offense, 1990, 1995, and 2000

column3: Number of sentenced inmates in Federal prisons

column1: Note:  All data are from the BJS Federal justice database.  Data for 1990 and 1995 are for December 31.  Data for 2000 are for September 30.  Data are based on all sentenced inmates, regardless of sentence.
a/Includes murder, nonnegligent manslaughter, and negligent manslaughter.
